text: Aleksei Viktorovich Brikov (; born 13 June 1978) is a former Russian football player. ==Club career== He made his Russian Premier League debut for FC KAMAZ- Chally Naberezhnye Chelny on 25 October 1996 in a game against FC Torpedo- Luzhniki Moscow. That was his only season in the RPL. ==References== Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Russian footballers Category:FC KAMAZ Naberezhnye Chelny players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Aleksei Brikov
